title: An Act to protect equity in real estate transactions

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Turco of Winthrop, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1332) of Jeffrey Rosario Turco relative to shared appreciation mortgage agreements.  Financial Services.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Financial Services
